data.value: Memoria of the Church Two Years Later

A crystallized memory of Bahamut SIN.
A present manifestation of the creature pulled
from past experiences and future potential.

A crystallized memory of events surrounding
the planet's new crisis two years after Meteor.
The group gathers at the church after overcoming the threat.

A crystallized memory of the
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS 2nd Anniversary.
Thank you for two fantastic years!

A crystallized memory of
THE FIRST SOLDIER: Episode - Three Ex-SOLDIERs.
"Instill the fire to burn down Shinra!"

A present manifestation of the character pulled
from past experiences and future potential.
